title: Add admin dashboard
constraints: Do not add a new Admin Dashboard feature because an Admin Dashboard UI with RBAC gating is already implemented in the current project (frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx) and is already reachable via the existing admin navigation entry in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not redesign or extend the existing Admin Dashboard functionality (menu management, all-orders management, live orders view) unless explicitly requested.
Do not add new admin authentication mechanisms beyond the existing Internet Identity + RBAC gating unless explicitly requested.
